    Class Description
    C3P0PooledConnection  
    Command
    Command Pattern implementation.
    ConfigLoader
    General utilities methods for loading configurations for JForum.
    ControllerUtils
    Common methods used by the controller.
    DataSourceConnection
    DataSource connection implementation for JForum.
    DBConnection
    Base class for all database connection implementations that may be used with JForum.
